home.desc: Avalanche Wallet is a simple, secure, non-custodial wallet for storing Avalanche assets.

access.title: Welcome Back!
access.desc: Access your existing Avalanche wallet here.

create.title: New to Avalanche Wallet?
create.desc: Create a new wallet to send, receive and swap Avalanche assets.

network.title: Networks
network.not_mainnet: This wallet is not connected to Mainnet.

blocker.desc: Connecting to a new network, please wait.

access.title: How do you want to access your wallet?
access.keystore_error: This keystore version is not supported.

mnemonic.title: Enter your MNEMONIC phrase
mnemonic.subtitle: Hit ‘SPACE’ after every successful word entry.
mnemonic.error: Invalid key phrase. Your phrase must be 24 words separated by a single space.

collectibles.empty: You do not own any collectibles.

create.generate: Generate a new key phrase to setup your Avalanche Wallet.
create.mnemonic_desc: Use these 24 words in sequential order to recover your Avalanche Wallet
create.warning: Store this key phrase in a secure location. Anyone with this key phrase can access your Avalanche Wallet. There is no way to recover lost key phrases.
create.confirm: I wrote down my key phrase in a secure location.
create.success_desc: It's time to access your Avalanche Wallet.
create.error_number: Oops, looks like you forgot to fill number
create.error_word: The mnemonic phrase you entered for word not match the actual phrase.

top.nftempty: You have not collected any non fungible tokens.
top.info2: I bought coins in the Token Sale. Where are my AVAX?
top.info2_desc: This wallet is connected to the Avalanche Everest test network. Your purchase will appear in the wallet after the Avalanche Mainnet launch.

address.desc_x_1: This is your X-Chain address to receive funds.
address.desc_x_2: Your address will change after every deposit. You can keep using previous addresses.
address.desc_p: This is your P-Chain address to receive staking rewards and cross chain transfers.
address.desc_c: This is your C-Chain address. Use it to interact with the ethereum virtual machine.

transfer.title: Send
transfer.no_cash: You must have an asset in your wallet to issue a transaction.
transfer.chain_warn: You can only send tokens on the X chain.
transfer.disconnected: Unable to send assets. Disconnected from the network.
transfer.success_msg: You have succesfully sent your transaction.

cross_chain.title: Cross Chain
cross_chain.desc: Transfer tokens between Exchange (X) , Platform (P) and Contract (C) chains.

menu1.title: New Family
menu1.desc: Create a new set of collectibles with a name and symbol.

menu2.title: Mint Collectible
menu2.desc: Issue collectibles for the families you created.
menu2.empty: You do not own any families you can mint.

mint.desc: Select a family to issue collectibles to.

typeDesc.generic: Generic collectibles consist of an image, title and a description. The wallet can display them nicely.
typeDesc.url: If the given URL is an image the wallet will try its best to display it nicely. Otherwise it will show up as a link.
typeDesc.json: JSON payloads are ideal for custom data structures and can be used to develop decentralized applications.
typeDesc.utf8: UTF8 payloads are simply text encoded into a collectible.

preview.info1: Complete the form to see the preview.

success.text2: The new collectibles are added to your wallet.

keys.title: My Keys
keys.subtitle: Active Key

save_account.title: Save Account
save_account.desc: Encode your wallet with a password and store securely on this browser.

keys.remember_key_info: You can later access your wallet on this browser with a password.
keys.account_slow_warning: Accounts with multiple keys may take a long time to load.
keys.export_key_desc: Enter a password to encode your private keys into a file. You can later use this file and your password to access your wallet.
keys.empty: This key does not have a balance.
keys.import_key_desc: Add additional keys to use with your wallet.
keys.import_key_success_msg: Private key and assets added to the wallet.
keys.import_key_duplicate_err: This private key has already been added to this wallet.
keys.import_mnemonic_duplicate_err: This mnemonic has already been added to this wallet.
keys.tooltip: This key will be forgotten when you refresh the browser.
keys.remove_success_msg: Private key and assets removed from the wallet.
keys.password_validation: Password must be at least 9 characters long.

portfolio.name: Name
portfolio.error_network: Unable to display assets. Disconnected from the network.
portfolio.nobalance: You do not have any assets
portfolio.nobalance_nft: You do not own any collectibles.
portfolio.noaddresses: You do not have any past addresses.

collectibles.mint_more: Mint more of this collectible family in the Studio.

earn.title: Earn
earn.desc: You can earn more AVAX by staking your existing tokens.
earn.warning_1: You must have at least {0} AVAX on the P chain to become a validator.
earn.warning_2: You must have at least {0} AVAX on the P chain to become a delegator.

validate_card.title: Validate
validate_card.desc: You have an Avalanche node that you want to stake with.

delegate_card.title: Delegate
delegate_card.desc: You do not own an Avalanche node, but you want to stake using another node.

transfer_card.title: Cross Chain Transfer
transfer_card.desc: Staking requires AVAX on the P chain. Transfer tokens between X and P.

rewards_card.title: Estimated Rewards
rewards_card.desc: View staking rewards you will receive.

transfer.err_desc: Import failed. Please go to Advanced page to finish importing.

success.title: Transfer Completed
success.message: You have successfully transferred between chains.

rewards.empty: You do not have any pending rewards.

duration.label: Staking End Date
duration.desc: Your AVAX tokens will be locked until this date.

amount.label: Stake Amount
amount.desc: The amount of AVAX to lock for staking.

fee.label: Delegation Fee
fee.desc: You will claim this % of the rewards from the delegators on your node.

reward.label: Reward Address
reward.desc: Where to send the staking rewards.

summary.max_del_tooltip: Maximum amount that can be delegated to this validator.
summary.warn: If it is your first time staking, start small. Staked tokens are locked until the end of the staking period.

confirmation.start_desc: Your validation will start at least 5 minutes after you submit this form.

success.title: Your validation transaction is sent.
success.desc: If the transaction is accepted your tokens will be locked for staking. You will receive your locked tokens plus the rewards once your staking period is over.

errs.duration_warn: WARNING: You must have at least 14 days remaining on your validation period to accept delegations.
errs.date: Start date must be in the future and end date must be after start date.
errs.amount: Stake amount must be at least {0} AVAX
errs.fee: Delegation fee must be at least {0}%
errs.address: Invalid address. Reward address must be a valid P chain address.

filter.title: Filter
filter.preview: {0} Validators found that match the criteria.

list.aval_stake_tip: How much more can be delegated to this validator.
list.up_tip: Relative to the node this wallet is connected to.

empty.title: No Validators Found
empty.desc: Validators need to be actively staking to be found.

period.label: Staking End Date
period.desc: Your AVAX tokens will be locked until this date.

amount.label: Stake Amount
amount.desc: The amount of AVAX to lock for staking.
amount.desc2: The available delegation amount for this node is {0} AVAX

reward.label: Reward Address
reward.desc: Where to send the staking rewards.

confirmation.start_desc: Your delegation will start 5 minutes after you submit this form.

errs.start_now: Start time must be after current time.
errs.start_end: Start date must be in the future and end date must be after start date.
errs.invalid_addr: Invalid address. Reward address must be a valid P chain address.
errs.no_addr: You must give an address to receive delegation rewards.
errs.val_end: Delegation end date can not be longer than the validator's end date.
errs.amt: Delegation amount must be at least {0} AVAX.

summary.warn: If it is your first time staking, start small. Staked tokens are locked until the end of the staking period.

success.title: Delegation transaction sent.
success.desc: If the transaction is accepted your tokens will be locked for staking. You will receive your locked tokens plus the rewards once your staking period is over.

import.title: Chain Import
import.desc: If you have funds stuck in a failed chain transfer, you can finish importing them here.

sign.title: Sign Message
sign.desc: Sign a message with your private key and prove ownership of an address.
sign.warn: Do not sign messages you don't trust.

verify.title: Check Message Source
verify.desc: Given a message and its signature, retrieve the address that signed it.

no_explorer.title: Explorer Not Found
no_explorer.desc: The active network settings has not provided an explorer API endpoint.

logout.confirmation: Are you sure you want to log out?
logout.confirmation_message: This wallet and its keys will be forgotten.

transactions.notx: No transactions found on the explorer.
transactions.warn_loading: This list might be incomplete and out of order.
transactions.error_api_desc: You must provide an Avalanche Explorer API for this network to view transaction history.

keystore.title: Update Keystore File
keystore.desc: We have upgraded keystore file spec. Please download your new keystore file and access the wallet again.

activateWallet.title: Activate Wallet
activateWallet.desc: There is an active wallet. Enter your password to access it.

utxo_select.title: Select Tokens
utxo_select.desc: Select the source of your funds to use in this transaction.

ledger.desc: Please confirm these actions on your ledger device.

ledger_upgrade.title: Trouble Connecting?
ledger_upgrade.desc: We're having trouble connecting to your device. Please make sure you have the Avalanche app open and upgraded to the latest version.

hd.future_warn_title: DO NOT USE THE ADDRESSES BELOW
hd.future_warn_desc: These are managed by the wallet and can cause loss of funds.
